sentences.english: Starting today however, the big beasts are back.
sentences.chinese: 不过从现在开始，生猛的野兽又回来了。

sentences.english: The animal was lured out of its hole.
He raved like a wild beast .
sentences.chinese: 他象野兽般地咆哮起来。

sentences.english: The oncoming force of the typhoon was ferocious.
Just before dinner, Basil nipped out for a pee in a darkness full of animals.
sentences.chinese: 开饭之前，巴兹尔溜到外面充满野兽的黑暗中去小便。

sentences.english: The beast preys on living animals.
I like Spearhead and the Beastie Boys.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢矛头跟《野兽男孩》。

sentences.english: It is said the origin of face changing has something to do with the resistance of wild beasts.
sentences.chinese: 相传“变脸”的由来与古代人们应对野兽侵犯有关。

sentences.english: how many beasts we heard talking good French like that?
sentences.chinese: 我们听过多少“野兽“像那样讲流利的法语？

sentences.english: How many of them were covered with sheepskin and thrown in to wild animals?
sentences.chinese: 有多少人，被披上羊皮，扔进野兽群中？

sentences.english: The wild animal charged at us suddenly.
sentences.chinese: 野兽突然向我们冲了过来。

sentences.english: For example, one myth says there was a man-eating beast whose weaknesses were the color red and loud noises.
sentences.chinese: 例如，传说有一个吃人的野兽害怕红色和响声。

sentences.english: Cheek-bone" and "teeth" represent his enemies as wild beasts ready to devour him.
sentences.chinese: “颊骨”和“牙齿”是他的敌人是野兽准备吃掉他。

sentences.english: I did not bring you animals torn by wild beasts; I bore the loss myself.
sentences.chinese: 被野兽撕裂的，我没有带来给你，是我自己赔上。

sentences.english: I didn't know you like the Beastie Boys so much.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道你这么喜欢野兽男孩乐团。

definition: jackal and wolf/ravenous wolf/fig. evil person/vicious tyrant
jackals, wolves, tigers and panthers (idiom)/animals who are dangerous to man and cattle/fierce and cruel people
